job.title: Volunteer Virtual Classroom Speaker (Meet a Software Engineer)
job.industry: Computer Software,Higher Education,Information Technology and Services
job.description: the volunteer opportunity below is a request from an educator for you to interact with his or her classroom the interaction is virtual so as long as you have a good internet connection and computer or device with a camera you can participate from anywhere the goal of the interaction is to bring real world application professional experience and relevance to what the educator is teaching once you accept the request for one of the dates proposed by the educator nepris will provide support and next steps to help you prepare and make sure you are successful you can also highlight this experience to strengthen the volunteer section of your linkedin profileltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtvolunteer virtual classroom speaker meet a software engineerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtdescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are investigating potential career pathways the goal of this conversation is to provide a realistic view of the profession to the students to help them in their decisionmaking processltbrgtltbrgtkey questionsltbrgtltbrgtwhat does a typical day look like in your occupation what do you spend most of your time doing every dayltbrgtltbrgtwhat are the day to day responsibilities that someone outside of your field might not know aboutltbrgtltbrgtwhat can you tell us about related occupations in your fieldltbrgtltbrgtwhat levels of education and training are requiredltbrgtltbrgtonce you complete the basic educationaltraining requirements for this occupation are there other related occupations that a person would be qualified forltbrgtltbrgttell us how what they are learning in school now applies to your occupationltbrgtltbrgtwhat should their focus be as freshmen if this profession is their ultimate goalltbrgtltbrgtexpected outcomesltbrgtltbrgti would like for my students to get a good overview of what to expect from a career in this field and what it takes to get
